mail_body:
Dear Mr. Lucas,

I am writing to express my interest in the position you have posted on None. With my experience in finance and payroll, I believe I would make an excellent addition to your team.

As a Payroll Manager at KWS GmbH, I was responsible for dealing with Excel and payment processes, which enabled me to gain a strong foundation in computer systems and softwares. My M.Sc. in Finance from Harvard University has further sharpened my attention to detail, critical thinking, and punctual character. I am fluent in English, Romanian, and Italian (native), and my determination and willingness to learn have equipped me with the skills needed to excel in any role.

I am thrilled to submit my application for the position, and I believe that my skills and experience make me an ideal candidate for the role within your prestigious organization. Thank you for taking the time to consider my application.

Sincerely,
Jude Smiley
